resources.string: By proceeding, you confirm you accept Kavach’s Agreement & Privacy Policy
Exponentially increasing frauds with hyper growth in digitization
More than 1000cr lost to frauds last year
1 out of 4 are victims of a fraud
Frauds are no longer limited to insecure websites or virus attacks. We will warn you if we detect anything suspicious/fraudulent which can be an app or a website or a link and much more

Kavach is against showing ads even though it can help us sustain(and maybe a lot more) as we believe privacy is a right all of us ought to have and even more so in the digital world. We don’t want to add yet another tracker cookie for ads to be shown and instead want to help you delete and stop other from tracking you incessantly.
We have the following subscriptions to help us sustain the infrastructure needed and provide you the best shield of digital fraud protection keeping up with sophisticated fraudsters.
Introductory offer of free additional protections released in the next 3 months
